name: Ben's 30% Deet Tick & Insect Repellent Wipes (12 Pa
categories: 30% Deet Tick& Insect Repellent Wipes (12 Pa
description: Tested in some of the worst bug-infested areas in the world, for protection against deer ticks, mosquitoes and other disease-carrying insects. These individually wrapped wipes let you control the amount and location of repellent, and are easy to transport without worry of spillage.Water-based remains on the skin surface so less DEET is absorbed into your skin.Fragrance free.Provides up to 8 hours of protection.Product contains 30% DEET.
